name: To From And Back Again
description:
Description:

A short metriodvania I made for the jam using a my previous project "Action Trainer" as a starting point. Link to action trainer: https://treven.itch.io/action-trainer

Features:

The main Metroidvania

Action trainer room

My experience with the Jam:

The jam was great. I learned so much during the jam. I had to constantly cut Ideas I had and make new solutions to certain problems (that I'm sure there are better ways to solve). I was feeling burned out towards the end trying to make the file and project as small and compact and understandable as possible. 

Lessons to take away

  • Use what you know not what you want to learn. 
  • learn to make asset packs for I'm not copying and pasting. That inflates the files size. 
  • Think small like 1 player, 1 boss, 1 level starting out.
  • focus on an emotion and take away between the 1 player, 1 boss, 1 level.
  • Make the replay fun with dynamic elements such as time or ranking because after a while it was tiring playtesting the single level over and over.
